title: iTunes typeface?
content:
Hello!

I am currently working on the design of a downloadable application for iTunes and was wondering if anyone could tell me what font iTunes is written in? This is the same font used on the mac website? I have tried whatthefont.com but it isn't giving me an accurate answer...

Cheers in advance folks :)

A\*
author: wicker84

comments.content: iTunes the application uses Lucida Grande. The store has Helvetica also.

Yeah I know that the copy is Lucida Grande... but the actual display font that 'iTunes' is written in and all other headings on the mac site appears to be a different font (see pics below)... does anyone know what font this is or is it exclusive to Apple?

A\*

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/iTunes_5506.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mac-font_5196.png)
It's pretty close to Myriad if it's not it.
